mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_tx_detail_index (address, desc_block_height, tx_detail_id, called_contract_hash, tx_time, event_type, asset_name, tx_direction) SELECT to_address, (~0 >> 33) - block_height, id, called_contract_hash, tx_time, event_type, asset_name, 1 FROM tbl_tx_detail WHERE block_height BETWEEN #{beginHeight} AND #{endHeight} ORDER BY block_height, tx_time ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tx_direction = 2;
